content: this is a photo tutorial for squaring up sophie s mandala depending on which hook and yarn you choose to use your square will be anywhere from 19 to 24 just remember that you will need to decide on your hook and yarn before starting with the mandala as you cannot swap over when you get to the squaring bit please join me in my ravelry group 1 where i have started a special thread for sophie s garden happy hooking dedri update french translation available here 2 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/look-at-what-i-made---crochet 2 http //www lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/free-crochet-patterns/sophies-garden-french-translation/
